sentences.sentence: To gain a larger audience share in our area, and thus increase company profits, KICK should also revise its broadcast schedule to inc lude more sports coverage.

sentences.sentence: They argue that competitive intelligence inc lude the competitive information of enterprises themselves, an important part of competitive intelligence and analysis the reasons with examples.
